title: Fuel_to_the_Fire_-_Brynn_OConnor.epub
description:
Carrie Zane swore she would never fall in love with a racer again.She'd never again put her heart on the line for a man who lives his life in the face of death.Marco Panda was born to drive.His only purpose in this world is to win, to drive his stock car at death defying speeds, to be a champion.After a brutal collision on the track, Marco ends up in the hospital and his father dies in a fiery wreck. On site as a trauma nurse, Carrie comes to Marco's rescue. Having lost her first true love to the perils of racing, Carrie finds herself entwined with Marco as they both cope with the loss of loved ones.Marco is determined to come back and rise to the top of the leader board, in spite of his injuries and the death of his father. Carrie finds strength in this beautiful man as their relationship revs up with ferocious speed. Together they inspire ambition, lust, and love in one another. 
Genre: Erotica
